mapper.select: select si.id, si.code, si.name, si.content, si.credit_code, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.address, si.longitude, si.latitude, si.images, si.del_flag, si.supply_type, si.create_date, si.business_license, si.bank_name, si.bank_account, si.status, si.sys_user_id from supplier_info si where 1 = 1 order by si.create_date desc
